Levent Erkök

12 Jan 2016

Intel Corporation 2501 NW 229th Ave Hillsboro, OR 97124 E-mail: erkokl at gmail.com

Curriculum Vitae

  • CV

Software

  • SBV: SMT Based Verification in Haskell
  • SBVPlugin GHC Core-plugin for SBV
  • HArduino Control your Arduino board from Haskell
  • LinearEqSolver Solve systems of linear equations using SMT solvers
  • CrackNum Analyze/decode/encode IEEE 754 floating-point values.
  • ISMT Yices SMT solver as an Isabelle theorem prover tactic.
